segments.text: Julia , I saw two men fighting beside our door this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know them . They are the two brothers living next door .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Brothers ? Do you know why they quarreled ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's said that the father's will caused the dissension among the two brothers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anybody acting as mediator in the dispute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , everyone keeps in mind that ' Don't intrude in a family dispute ' .
segments.speaker: S2
